description: Sequence is defined by property that (a0,a1,a2,a3,...) = binomial transform of (a0,a0,a0,a1,a1,a1,a2,a2,a2,a3,a3,a3,...).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; add(`if`(k<3, 1,      a(iquo(k, 3)))*binomial(n, k), k=0..n)    end:seq(a(n), n=0..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 08 2015
author: _Jonas Wallgren_
